author: Brad Colbow
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com
$330 currently on Lenovo's website https://go.magik.ly/ml/2cj0l/ (affiliate link)

I was surprised at how good this tablet is for the price. the only downside is the pen. It's a standard USI stylus. But you might be willing to compromise for how much you will save compaired to something like the Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE plus.
